text: Can someone please help me to know how to add an addition domain name to the Company Domain Property via code?
Or at least confirm if it is possible?
Is there a way to get the deal owner email property using the `<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals/batch/read>` API?
The API shows a `HubSpot_owner_id` property in the example which I assume is the owner ID but when we call the api the `HubSpot_owner_id` property is missing.
Hello, is it always guaranteed to have `hs_email_sender_email`  populated in the `<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/emails/search>`  API? it seems somehow sometimes it is not returned properly
Also I verified that sometimes `hs_email_sender_email` contains the wrong value...
